mapper.insert: insert into message(from_user_id, to_user_id, isi_message, is_read, created_on, updated_on) values(#{fromUserId}, #{toUserId}, #{isiMessage}, #{isRead},#{createdOn}, #{updatedOn})
mapper.update: UPDATE message SET is_read = 1 where to_user_id = #{userId}
mapper.sql: u.name as fromUser,u1.name as toUser,m.isi_message as isiMessage,m.is_read as isRead,m.created_on as createdOn
mapper.select: select count(*) from message m inner join user u on m.from_user_id = u.id inner join user u1 on m.to_user_id = u1.id where m.to_user_id = #{userId} and m.is_read = 0
select m.from_user_id as id,u.name as name from message m inner join user u on m.from_user_id = u.id inner join user u1 on m.to_user_id = u1.id where m.to_user_id = #{userId} and m.is_read = 0

select * from(select distinct u.name as fromName ,m.isi_message as isiMessage,m.created_on as createdOn from message m inner join user u on m.from_user_id = u.id inner join user u1 on m.to_user_id = u1.id where m.to_user_id = #{userId} limit 0,100 Union select distinct u.name as fromName,m.isi_message as isiMessage,m.created_on as createdOn from message m inner join user u on m.from_user_id = u.id inner join user u1 on m.to_user_id = u1.id where m.from_user_id = #{userId} limit 0,100) as id order by createdOn asc
